allow: Bash(git -C /home/runner/workspace add statements/balance-sheet.ts statements/cash-flow.ts statements/event-applier.ts statements/index.ts statements/reconcile.ts statements/types.ts)

Bash(git -C /home/runner/workspace add server/auth.ts server/calculationChecker.ts server/routes.ts server/storage.ts client/src/lib/constants.ts client/src/lib/financialEngine.ts shared/constants.ts)

Bash(git -C /home/runner/workspace commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Harden auth, fix verification tolerances, and eliminate magic numbers

- Remove password lowercasing in hashPassword/verifyPassword \(preserves entropy\)
- Replace hardcoded password hashes in seed endpoint with dynamic hashing from env vars
- Fix withinTolerance zero-expected check to use TOLERANCE constant instead of $1
- Move DEFAULT_OCCUPANCY_RAMP_MONTHS to shared constants, use ?? instead of || in both engines
- Wrap deleteUser in database transaction for atomicity
- Fix NOI margin description to match actual 5-60% bounds

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /home/runner/workspace commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Harden session security, protect system accounts, and secure image endpoints

- Add requireAuth + rate limiting \(5/min\) to /api/generate-image \(was unauthenticated\)
- Add rate limiting \(5/min\) to /api/generate-property-image
- Increase login lockout from 1 minute to 15 minutes
- Change session cookie sameSite from "lax" to "strict"
- Reduce session duration from 30 days to 7 days
- Block admin/checker from changing their email via profile endpoint
- Hide internal error messages in production for 500-level errors

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /home/runner/workspace commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add database constraints: CASCADE deletes, CHECK bounds, unique indexes

- Add ON DELETE CASCADE to all 13 foreign keys \(users, properties, conversations\)
- Add CHECK constraints on global_assumptions \(projectionYears 1-30, rates 0-1\)
- Add CHECK constraints on properties \(roomCount > 0, ADR > 0, occupancy/rates 0-1\)
- Add UNIQUE constraint on scenarios\(userId, name\) to prevent duplicates
- Add UNIQUE constraint on prospective_properties\(userId, externalId, source\)
- Add index on messages\(conversationId\) for query performance

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /home/runner/workspace commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Replace hardcoded values with named constants in engine and seed

- Refactor partner comp lookup from manual 10-element array to loop over keys
- Replace hardcoded array bound \(9\) with DEFAULT_PARTNER_COMP.length - 1
- Replace hardcoded occupancyRampMonths: 6 with DEFAULT_OCCUPANCY_RAMP_MONTHS in seed

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
